Regex Replacement String: How is the color green made?
Green is a wonderful color. When you think of green, you may think of the forest, grass, plants, or really anything involving the natural world.
For those artists out there who may wish to recreate the hue, you may be wondering...what do I need to do to create the color green?

Green is a combination of the colors yellow and blue. So, combining these colors will result in your desired color green! (Tip: changing the ratios of the blue or yellow can result in a different hue!)
